dt: {bc}something fanciful, elaborate, or intricate in design
{bc}something (such as a {d_link|figure of speech|figure of speech}) in a literary work designed to achieve a particular artistic effect
{bc}a conventional stage practice or means (such as a {d_link|stage whisper|stage whisper}) used to achieve a particular dramatic effect
{bc}a piece of equipment or a mechanism designed to serve a special purpose or perform a special function
{bc}an emblematic design used especially as a heraldic bearing {dx_def}see {dxt|bearing|bearing|4}{/dx_def}

et: Middle English {it}devis, devise{/it}, from Anglo-French, division, plan, from {it}deviser{/it} to divide, regulate, tell {ma}{mat|devise|}{/ma}
shortdef: something devised or contrived: such as
a scheme to deceive : stratagem, trick

dt: {bc}a semiconductor device that is used especially as an optical sensor and that stores charge and transfers it sequentially to an amplifier and detector

shortdef: a semiconductor device that is used especially as an optical sensor and that stores charge and transfers it sequentially to an amplifier and detector —called also CCD, charged coupled device

dt: {bc}a device inserted into and left in the uterus to prevent effective conception

shortdef: a device inserted into and left in the uterus to prevent effective conception —called also intrauterine contraceptive device, IUD

et: Middle English {it}at point devis{/it} at a fixed point
shortdef: marked by punctilious attention to detail : meticulous

dt: {bc}a device that is implanted in the chest or upper abdomen to assist the left or right {d_link|ventricle|ventricle} in pumping blood in a damaged or weakened heart

shortdef: a device that is implanted in the chest or upper abdomen to assist the left or right ventricle in pumping blood in a damaged or weakened heart —called also VAD

dt: {bc}a floating device that is designed to save a person from drowning {bc}life preserver

shortdef: a floating device that is designed to save a person from drowning : life preserver

dt: {bc}a small hidden microphone that is used to secretly listen to and record people

shortdef: a small hidden microphone that is used to secretly listen to and record people
